Articles.Content:
Since I was nice most of the year and only accidentally "lost" a handful of Kerbals, I'm confident that my modest list will be delivered in the Christmas update.

1. A compact size 2 to 3 adapter

2. Bi, Tri and Quad size 3 to size 2 adapters

3. A selection of ridiculously Soviet quinque, sexa, septi... size 3 to size 1 adapters,

4. And, if you are feeling generous, a MK2 to size 1 cockpit.

I'm sure than Rudolf and is flying crew will find these additions useful as well.

Merry Christmas to all Kerbonauts, MsieurDionne

Sorry, but 0.90.0 does not have these features, and a new update will definitely not be out by Christmas. 0.90.0 might be out by then, though.

EDIT: To clarify: I meant that the current update that's in development may be out by Christmas, but none of the features above will be in it. A new update would have to be started entirely, and a new update would not be out by Christmas.

- - - Updated - - -

Though I do think these parts would be nice.

Edited December 10, 2014 by GregroxMun

Sorry, but 0.90.0 does not have these features, and a new update will definitely not be out by Christmas. 0.90 might be out by then, though.

- - - Updated - - -

Though I do think these parts would be nice.

Either you're being sarcastic or 0.90.0 =/= 0.90

The Fleetmaster is confused...

Well, if you ask me: adapters should be better ( the 2.5-1.25 compact adapter is good, use that theme) and also should have a connection node separate from the adapter nodes. I mean an adapter should have a fairing around sits engines. This can be done by placing an attachment node below where the engines will be.

In this case, to stick to the theme, I will probably blame my over optimism on the Christmas Spirit.

I'm in no hurry though, and I may even be prepared to cede my patents.

Edited December 9, 2014 by MsieurDionne

I don't know about 3, but aside from that those would be rly nice. Sounds a lot like the core stuff that still justifies the use of b9 but especially the compact adapters and the mk2/1.25m cockpit are usefull (using the mod variant frequently)

I was trying to keep my installation as light as possible, I never took the time to consider these crowded parts pack. After some search, I must admit that some are tempting... I suppose that I could delete the unwanted parts from Gamedata.
